Name: set_baselight_iec
Comment: Make the baselight comply to the IEC 60204-1 standard and indicate whether the robot is in a safety stop, in freedrive as well as the operational mode. Further details of the colors can be seen in the UR20 manual.

Name: set_baselight_solid
Comment: Set a color on the entire baselight ring as specified by the given RGB values in the range 0-255.
